title: Someone logged into my account
body:
Yesterday I got a notification after a game that said "Your account has been logged in from an other computer." I didn't know what to do so i just relogged. Today i had like 6-7 person asking "WTF, what is this, what the hell" in my message box. I opened the messages and to all of them that "other computer" sent this mesage: " Hey check out this league discord i think you'll like it EDIT ". Can you help me find uot what this was? I'm going to change my password to prevent things like this to happen again.

Acc.: xXDeadEagleXx
Server: EU N&E
Messages sent: 2018.01.14. 00:04

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}} {{sticker:sg-lux-2}} {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body: If you haven't already, I would *absolutely* reach out to our account team asap. They'll be able to help you recover and repair your account from any damage a hacker might have done. Any time you suspect your account was hacked, that ticket should be the very first step since we can't do recoveries here on the boards.
This link might send the ticket over to our NA agents, but they'll be able to forward it along for ya-> [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
someone on my friends list had the same exact thing happen to their account, with the same message sent.
I just got the same message from someone from my friendlist. RIOT something's happening :/
